scripts.documents-api:dev: cd documents-api &&  poetry run python server.py
scripts.celery:dev: cd documents-api && poetry run celery -A celery_app worker --loglevel=info --concurrency=2
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "Next JS App, Documents API, Celery Worker" --prefix-colors "green,magenta,cyan" "pnpm app:dev" "pnpm documents-api:dev" "pnpm celery:dev"
scripts.start: concurrently --names "Next JS App, Documents API" --prefix-colors "green,magenta" "pnpm app:start" "pnpm documents-api:dev"
